validationRules.block_id: Required, unique identifier for the block instance
validationRules.ImgRepeater: Required if Imgoption is 'repeater', minimum 1 item recommended 4-12 for best UX
validationRules.NAddImg: Required if Imgoption is 'normal', array of WordPress media IDs
validationRules.ImgRepeater._key: Required for each repeater item, must be unique within array (React key)
validationRules.ImgRepeater.Rimg: Required for each image item, must have url property
validationRules.ImgRepeater.VSource: Required for video items, must be 'self-hosted', 'youtube', or 'vimeo'
validationRules.ImgRepeater.YouTubeId: Required if VSource is 'youtube', 11-character video ID
validationRules.ImgRepeater.VimeoId: Required if VSource is 'vimeo', numeric video ID
validationRules.ImgRepeater.RVideo: Required if VSource is 'self-hosted', must have url property
validationRules.columns: Responsive object, md/sm/xs values must add up to 12 (Bootstrap grid system)
validationRules.colMetro: Required for metro layout, defines column count
validationRules.MetroSty: Required for metro layout, defines tile pattern per breakpoint
validationRules.Category: If true, RCategory must be set on all ImgRepeater items for filtering to work
validationRules.FCusURl: If true, Rurl must be set on ImgRepeater items for custom links
validationRules.DisBtns4: Only applies to style-4, requires Btns4txt if true
validationRules.FancyOption: Must be valid JSON string, invalid JSON breaks lightbox

warnings: ⚠️ GalleryType: 'video' cannot use FancyBox lightbox (videos play inline in modal, not full lightbox)
⚠️ layout: 'carousel' disables category filtering (Category setting ignored)
⚠️ layout: 'metro' requires colMetro and MetroSty to be set (layout breaks without these)
⚠️ ImgRepeater: Each item MUST have unique _key value (React rendering breaks with duplicates)
⚠️ RCategory: Case-sensitive ('Travel' !== 'travel') - filters won't match if case differs
⚠️ columns: Values use Bootstrap 12-column system (md: 3 = 4 columns, md: 4 = 3 columns, md: 6 = 2 columns)
⚠️ FancyOption: Must escape quotes in JSON string or use single quotes outside (breaks if invalid JSON)
⚠️ VSource: 'self-hosted' increases bandwidth usage (use YouTube/Vimeo for high-traffic sites)
⚠️ ImgSize: 'full' loads full-resolution images (can be 2-5MB each, use 'large' for web)
⚠️ Category filters: Requires at least 2 different RCategory values to be useful
⚠️ style-4: Only style that shows content BELOW image (not overlay) - different layout behavior
⚠️ FCusURl: Must be true for Rurl links to work, false makes all items open in FancyBox
⚠️ Boxlink: true makes entire card clickable (can interfere with button clicks in style-4)
⚠️ PopupIcon: Requires FontAwesome loaded (icons won't show without FA CSS)
⚠️ Masonry layout: Images with similar heights work best (extreme height differences create large gaps)
⚠️ Metro style-2: First item becomes 2x2 large tile (ensure it's your best/featured image)
⚠️ Carousel: Requires Swiper.js library (adds ~30KB to page load)
⚠️ Hfilter: CSS filter effects (blur, brightness, etc.) are GPU-intensive (limit to <20 items for 60fps)
commonMistakes: ❌ Forgetting to set unique _key values in ImgRepeater array (causes React 'key prop' warnings)
❌ Using columns: {md: 3} expecting 3 columns (actually creates 4 columns in 12-column grid)
❌ Setting Category: true but not adding RCategory to ImgRepeater items (filters show 'All' with 0 items)
❌ Mixing uppercase/lowercase in RCategory ('Design' vs 'design') breaks filtering
❌ Using ImgSize: 'full' for web galleries (loads massive 5MB images, slow page load)
❌ Setting FCusURl: false expecting custom links to work (requires FCusURl: true)
❌ Adding invalid JSON to FancyOption (breaks FancyBox, no error shown to user)
❌ Using YouTube URLs instead of IDs (YouTubeId: 'dQw4w9WgXcQ' not 'https://youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ')
❌ Enabling Category filters on carousel layout (filters are disabled for carousel)
❌ Using metro layout without setting MetroSty (defaults to style-1, not the expected mixed tiles)
❌ Setting Dtitle: false and Dcontent: false with Disicon: false (completely empty overlay, confusing UX)
❌ Using style-4 with Boxlink: true and DisBtns4: true (entire card and button both clickable, bad UX)
❌ Loading 50+ full-resolution images in masonry layout (page loads 100MB+ of images, very slow)
❌ Using fa-solid-* icon names (should be fa fa-icon-name for FontAwesome 4.x)
❌ Setting columnSpace too large (>50px creates excessive whitespace, breaks visual cohesion)
❌ Not testing on mobile (carousel slideColumns: {xs: 1} recommended, not xs: 4)
bestPractices: ✅ Always set unique _key values for ImgRepeater items (use indices '0', '1', '2' or UUIDs)
✅ Use ImgSize: 'large' for web galleries (1024px max, good balance of quality and performance)
✅ Keep ImgRepeater to 12-24 items per gallery (use pagination or load more for larger galleries)
✅ Use descriptive Rtitle and RCaption (improves accessibility and SEO)
✅ Set Rimg even for videos (custom thumbnails control branding, better than auto-generated)
✅ Use masonry for photography galleries (natural heights showcase images best)
✅ Use grid for portfolios/products (uniform heights create clean, professional look)
✅ Use metro for featured content (style-2 highlights first item as hero)
✅ Use carousel for client logos/testimonials (horizontal scrolling saves vertical space)
✅ Set Category filters with 3-6 categories (2 too few, 10+ overwhelming)
✅ Use FilterHs: 'style-2' for modern UI (bubble hover effect more engaging than underline)
✅ Set columnSpace: 15-25px for breathing room (10px too tight, 40px too loose)
✅ Use gradient overlays for readability (Nbgcolor transparent → black 70% ensures text contrast)
✅ Set responsive typography (TitleTypo fontSize: {md: 20, sm: 18, xs: 16} scales nicely)
✅ Enable FancyBox thumbnails for galleries (thumbs: {autoStart: true} aids navigation)
✅ Use LoopFancy: true for circular navigation (better UX than hitting dead end)
✅ Set target: '_blank' for external portfolio links (keeps users on your site)
✅ Use nofollow: true for client/affiliate links (SEO: don't pass link juice)
✅ Test all breakpoints (md/sm/xs) - columns, typography, spacing should adjust
✅ Optimize images before upload (compress to <200KB each, use WebP if supported)
✅ Use alt text on Rimg (accessibility and SEO, describe image content)
✅ Set TitleTag: 'h3' for galleries (maintains semantic heading hierarchy)
✅ Use style-1 or style-2 for image-focused galleries (style-4 is button-focused)
✅ Limit Hfilter effects (brightness + saturate only, avoid blur for performance)

accessibilityNotes.images: All images should have alt text (set via WordPress media library)
accessibilityNotes.filters: Category filters should have aria-labels ('Filter by Design', 'Filter by Photography')
accessibilityNotes.lightbox: FancyBox has built-in keyboard navigation (arrows, Esc, Space)
accessibilityNotes.focusManagement: Ensure filters, images, and buttons are keyboard accessible (Tab navigation)
accessibilityNotes.colorContrast: Overlay text must have 4.5:1 contrast ratio (white text on dark overlay recommended)
accessibilityNotes.screenReaders: Use TitleTag: 'h3' to maintain heading hierarchy (don't skip from h2 to h5)
accessibilityNotes.animations: Respect prefers-reduced-motion (disable hover effects for users who prefer less animation)
accessibilityNotes.touchTargets: Minimum 44×44px touch target (set Iconsize to at least 44px on mobile)
accessibilityNotes.videoAccessibility: YouTube/Vimeo embeds should have captions enabled (set in video platform)
accessibilityNotes.linkPurpose: Button text should be descriptive (use 'View Architecture Project' not 'Learn more')

performanceConsiderations.imageOptimization: Compress images to <200KB each, use WebP format (80-90% smaller than JPEG)
performanceConsiderations.lazyLoading: Enable lazy loading for images (WordPress 5.5+ has native lazy loading)
performanceConsiderations.totalImages: Limit to 12-24 images per page (use pagination/load more for larger galleries)
performanceConsiderations.videoEmbeds: YouTube/Vimeo embeds lazy-load on click (don't embed videos on page load)
performanceConsiderations.libraryLoading: Isotope.js (masonry/filtering) + FancyBox + Swiper.js can add 50-80KB total
performanceConsiderations.columnSpace: Larger gaps mean fewer items visible, faster initial render
performanceConsiderations.FancyBox: Thumbnails add overhead (load 12 thumbnail images + full images)
performanceConsiderations.hoverEffects: CSS filters (Hfilter) are GPU-intensive, limit to <20 items
performanceConsiderations.masonryPerformance: Isotope.js calculates layout on resize (can lag on mobile with 50+ items)
performanceConsiderations.carouselPerformance: Swiper.js renders only visible slides + 1-2 adjacent (efficient for 100+ slides)
performanceConsiderations.metroPerformance: CSS Grid layout is highly performant (better than masonry for 50+ items)
performanceConsiderations.filterAnimation: Isotope filtering animates all items (can lag with 100+ items)
performanceConsiderations.caching: Enable browser caching for images (set Cache-Control: max-age=31536000)
performanceConsiderations.CDN: Serve images from CDN (reduces latency, improves Time to First Byte)

troubleshooting.imagesNotShowing: Check Rimg.url is valid, check ImgSize exists in WordPress, check image file actually uploaded
troubleshooting.filtersNotWorking: Verify RCategory set on ALL items, verify Category: true, check for typos in category names (case-sensitive)
troubleshooting.fancyBoxNotOpening: Check FancyOption is valid JSON (test in JSON validator), verify FancyBox CSS/JS loaded, check browser console for errors
troubleshooting.videoNotPlaying: Check YouTubeId is 11 characters, check VimeoId is numeric, check RVideo.url is direct .mp4 link
troubleshooting.metroLayoutBroken: Verify MetroSty set, verify colMetro set, check if metroCustom syntax is valid
troubleshooting.carouselNotSliding: Check Swiper.js loaded, check slideColumns set, verify ImgRepeater has 2+ items
troubleshooting.masonryGaps: Images with extreme height differences create gaps (use similar aspect ratios)
troubleshooting.buttonsNotShowing: style-4 only: check DisBtns4: true, check Btns4txt not empty
troubleshooting.customLinksNotWorking: Check FCusURl: true, verify Rurl.url set on each item
troubleshooting.overlayNotShowing: Check Nbgcolor openBg: 1, verify bgType and color set, check z-index not conflicting
troubleshooting.iconsNotShowing: Check PopupIcon is valid FontAwesome class, verify FA CSS loaded, check Disicon: true
troubleshooting.filterStyleNotApplying: Check FilterHs value, verify filter-specific color attributes set (FCNcr, FCHcr, etc.)
troubleshooting.responsiveNotWorking: Check all breakpoints set (md/sm/xs), verify responsive object syntax {md: value}
troubleshooting.hoverEffectsNotWorking: Check Hbgcolor or Hfilter set, verify ImgHE value, check CSS transitions not disabled
troubleshooting.sluggishPerformance: Too many images (reduce to 12-24), images too large (use 'large' not 'full'), too many filters (CPU-intensive)
